title: [Feature Request] Having a descriptive summarization of the optimizer
body_html:
I was wondering if a more descriptive version of the representation of a optimizer object can be given. Currently, this is what is returned:

>>> optimizer = t.optim.SGD(model.parameters(), lr=1e-03)
>>> optimizer
<torch.optim.sgd.SGD object at address>

I would like to add something like:

>>> optimizer
SGD (
Parameter Group 0
    learning rate = 1e-03
    momentum = 0
    nesterov = False
    weight_decay = 0
    dampening = 0
)

Let me know your views. If required, I would be happy to work on a PR.

body:
I was wondering if a more descriptive version of the representation of a optimizer object can be given. Currently, this is what is returned:
```
>>> optimizer = t.optim.SGD(model.parameters(), lr=1e-03)
>>> optimizer
<torch.optim.sgd.SGD object at address>
```

I would like to add something like:
```
>>> optimizer
SGD (
Parameter Group 0
    learning rate = 1e-03
    momentum = 0
    nesterov = False
    weight_decay = 0
    dampening = 0
)
```

Let me know your views. If required, I would be happy to work on a PR.
